00024 #ifndef __mqtt_exception_h

00031 #include <string>
00032 #include <vector>
00033 #include <memory>
00034 #include <exception>
00035 #include <stdexcept>
00036 
00037 namespace mqtt {
00038 
00040 
00045 class exception : public std::runtime_error
00046 {
00047     int code_;
00048 
00049 public:
00050     explicit exception(int reasonCode) : std::runtime_error("mqtt::exception"),
00051                                             code_(reasonCode) {}
00055     //java.lang.Throwable   getCause()
00059     std::string get_message()  const { return std::string(what()); }
00063     int get_reason_code() const { return code_; }
00068     std::string to_str() const { return std::string(what()); }
00073     virtual const char* what() const noexcept {
00074         return std::exception::what();
00075     }
00076 };
00077 
00079 
00084 class persistence_exception : public exception
00085 {
00086 public:
00087     // TODO: Define "reason codes"
00088     persistence_exception() : exception(MQTTCLIENT_PERSISTENCE_ERROR) {}
00089     persistence_exception(int reasonCode) : exception(reasonCode) {}
00090 };

00098 class security_exception : public exception
00099 {
00100 public:
00101     security_exception(int reasonCode) : exception(reasonCode) {}
00102 };
